thread.title: DealerSocket Named Preferred Website Provider for Kia Motors
thread.title_full: DealerSocket Named Preferred Website Provider for Kia Motors

author: admin
title: DealerSocket Named Preferred Website Provider for Kia Motors
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/29/2015 @ 9:44 AM   DealerSocket 
SAN CLEMENTE, Calif., Sept. 29, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- For the second time in two months, DealerFire, the website and digital marketing arm of DealerSocket, has been named a preferred website provider for a major automotive manufacturer. DealerSocket, a leading technology provider for automotive dealerships nationwide, has been selected as a preferred provider for Kia Motors. In August, DealerSocket partnered with Jaguar Land Rover. 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20130620/LA35828LOGO 
This latest partnership means DealerSocket will be providing responsive websites and digital marketing solutions for Kia dealerships throughout the United States through its DealerFire product offering. DealerSocket acquired DealerFire in January, a move that allowed the company to expand its already rich product offering. Prior to the Kia and Jaguar Land Rover partnerships, DealerFire was already a preferred website and digital marketing provider for Toyota, Scion, and Volkswagen. 
"Kia is a brand that continues to garner respect in the industry and we're very pleased to welcome more of the company's franchise dealers onto the DealerSocket platform," says Matt Redden, DealerSocket CMSO. "DealerSocket's vision aligns perfectly with that of Kia Motors. We are excited about the benefits we can provide for Kia dealers and we can't wait to get started." 
While the partnership allows Kia dealerships throughout the country to experience the benefits of the DealerSocket website and digital marketing solutions, the overall portfolio of products that DealerSocket offers will likely be a big part of the appeal as well. DealerSocket offers a wide variety of technology services, including a cutting-edge CRM solution, and this partnership will make it easier for many Kia dealers to have their major technology services under one roof. 
To learn more about DealerSocket's partnership with Kia Motors, visit www.dealerfire.com/kia or call 844-815-4692. 
About DealerSocket DealerSocket is a leading automotive technology platform that helps dealerships in the United States, Canada and Australia improve profitability through a fully integrated suite of marketing, sales, service, customer experience DMS and data mining solutions. Headquartered in San Clemente, Calif., DealerSocket employs more than 650 people, serves more than 6,500 dealerships and 206,000 active users in the United States, Canada and Australia. DealerSocket's advanced technology provides benchmarking data that paces the industry, and its insightful experts identify trends and develop strategic roadmaps that help dealers optimize processes and operate more profitably. Visit DealerSocket.com for more information. 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/dealersocket-named-preferred-website-provider-for-kia-motors-300150856.html 
SOURCE DealerSocket
